name: It's Almost 5PM
description:
Done for the Finnish Game Jam 2021 with the prompt "Lost and Found".
Move with the left and right arrows and interact with A.
P or ESC to pause.
Your goal is to find a report for your boss.
You lost your own so go searching for someone elses. You can also cause mischief to get many people reprimanded and not get fired. Although you need to do it a few times for it to work.
3 Different characters with different hiding spots from the guards and speeds.
